title: Rasayana Raw Food Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Fusion
description: Small raw food cafe at the back of Rasayana Retreat Spa; same owners and similar menu as its Bangkok cafe. Offers a full menu with appetizers, soups, salads, mains, and dessert. The retreat center offers cleanses. All vegan except for honey in a few desserts and drinks. Has wheatgrass and fresh pressed juices. Last order is 9pm. Directions: Look for the Rasayana Retreat Spa on North Pattaya Rd approx. 250 yards east of Naluka traffic circle, on north side of road, go to the left past the spa's reception desk to the cafe.
streetAddress: 179/201 Moo 5 North Pattaya Rd, Naklua, Banglamung
